aboutMeSection.title: 自己紹介
aboutMeSection.introduction:
I’m a software engineer with a strong focus on front-end development, backed by a foundation in back-end programming. My journey into coding began with a passion for creating tools that automate and improve daily tasks. I enjoy the freedom that programming offers, where design and implementation possibilities are virtually limitless.
One of my key strengths is the ability to quickly analyze code, identify inefficiencies, and refactor it to align with the intended goals. Whether it’s last-minute bug fixes or quick pivots under time pressure, I thrive on delivering quality solutions.
Beyond work, I’m passionate about personal growth. I enjoy calisthenics, acrobatics, and learning Japanese, as well as experimenting in the kitchen. My approach to life is rooted in organization: breaking tasks into manageable chunks and prioritizing for efficiency. Following the 80:20 principle, I focus on completing 80% of a task quickly to achieve the best result and refine it over time.
aboutMeSection.resumeInfo: Curious about my background and experience? View my resume with an overview of my education and work history.
